website_summaries.verdict: The Sony 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 Standard Zoom is a solid starter lens when bundled with the a camera, but it's priced a bit too high when purchased separately.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive kit lens, much-maligned, better than average
customer_reviews.text: It's not a German super-lens, but it's not a bad lens. Pros: 1) Stop it down ~1.5 stops & it's sharp 2) Sharp enough for Sony A7r2 's "Clear Image Zoom" mode. 2a) Crops: 1.3x ='s ~ 32 megapixels, 1.4x = ~36mp, 1.5x = ~42mp. 2b) Need to use center balance AF modes. 3) In-lens image stabilization buys at least 1 stop 4) Very quiet AF motor, good enough for casual videography Cons: 1) Distortion in the corners 2) Some chromatic aberration 3) Soft in the edges 4) Vignetting in the corners Semi-con's: 1) Focus-by-wire obscures MFD & infinity (no haptic feedback in lens) 2) FBW is variable (not suitable for focus-pulling in serious cinematography)
customer_reviews.author: Leebert

customer_reviews.title: It's ok !
customer_reviews.text: At 1st it seemed good, then i hit the record button to record myself talking and the picture looks like im talking infront of a window with blinds . So there are lines across the picture..... very upset, as i waited so long for this ro arrive. If there's some way to fix this, please let me know. Otherwise ill return it and buy from another seller. EDIT: I PLAYED WITH THE LENS, RECONNECTED IT A FEW TIMES, PLAYED WITH MY SETTINGS AND GOT IT TO LOOK BETTER ! ILL KEEP IT!!
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: LENS WORKED FINE, SOME SCRATCHES DID NOT EFFECT PERFORMANCE
customer_reviews.text: LENS WORKED FINE, SOME SCRATCHES DID NOT EFFECT PERFORMANCE. I ORDERED A SECOND LENS FROM THE SAME SELLER, NOW I WILL HAVE 2. DON'T LET THE APPEARANCE BOTHER YOU IT WILL NOT EFFECT THE PHOTO.
customer_reviews.author: howard

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Love this lens. Makes a great addition to my A6000. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ewan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Auto focus is slow but this is a great lens. This is the lens I use now when I am not sure what to expect. Great for action shots and close-ups. see sample pictures taken without tripod!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best all round e-mount lens from Sony
customer_reviews.text: Since owning the NE5 Sony camera, I have invested in several e-mount lenses and found the 18-55mm to be my best "general" lens for typical point and shoot photos. My camera was not bundled with this lens so I was happy to pick it up as a "USED" item... saving me $$$. It's a must have if you own the Sony e-mount camera platform!
customer_reviews.author: RICKCARL80

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Auto focus sucks with this lens, also not much zoom nor is it well for vlogging. Stick with the 16-50 kit lens or save for a good lens.
customer_reviews.author: Tustin

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to this and didn’t wanna spend over 100 for another lens. Really awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chen

customer_reviews.title: This item was very affordable.
customer_reviews.text: This lens is very hard to find. It is for the smallest DSLR in the world. I'm so grateful to have this thing. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Eric DeRise

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: i had lens not opening in my old camera and cost of the replacement was cheaper than to fix it! Great deal and works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a good lens upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because I dropped my 16-50 kit lens. Got free one day shipping. Minor wear and all cosmetic as the ad states. Over all in fantastic shape considering the price and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Weslie McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Images a are clean and crisp. When in continuous ...
customer_reviews.text: Images a are clean and crisp. When in continuous autofocus, it constantly trues to focus the lens on my a6300 and you can hear it. None of my other lenses do that.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: After all the "kit lenses" I've had in my many years of photography, this one sits at the top of the heap. Nice build quality, feels good in the hand, reasonably sharp images for a lens of this offering. Smooth zooming and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: electrlux

customer_reviews.title: looks great and best of all
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, packaged with care, looks great and best of all, works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very crisp pictures
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are quite crisp and the auto focus is quick enough. This lens is good considering the money paid for it. Eventually I will save some money and get a better lens. But so far this is holding up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed this lense for my Sony Nex-3 camera. It was a great price for a great product. I haven't had any issues with it. Sony is great!
customer_reviews.author: Aprielle

customer_reviews.title: It's a freaking good manual lens
customer_reviews.text: A great lens, plenty of attachments made for this lens, I have the wide angle attachment, I'm really happy I bought this lens.

customer_reviews.title: I say best picture, I bought a sony Nex-5 body
customer_reviews.text: I say best picture , I bought a sony Nex-5 body,

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom lens
customer_reviews.text: This lens works great with zooming and for video. It is probably the best all around lens I've used of the Sony Alpha lenses.

customer_reviews.title: excellent addition to my camera bag
customer_reviews.text: love the zoom lens - it is a perfect addition to the prime lens than came with my Sony NEX5
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Donald L. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It's gives great results for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Everyone with a Sony emount camera should have this lens. It's gives great results for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tessier

customer_reviews.title: Good, but only if you have a specific use for it.
customer_reviews.text: Sony makes a 16-50 lens that is physically smaller and incorporates a power zoom that would usually be a better choice for most users. I happened to have an unusual requirement that "forced" me to buy this lens and I'm happy with its performance. That stated, I still revert to the 16-50 power zoom or the 55-210 zoom for every-day use.
customer_reviews.author: Pastel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good IQ over the APSC frame for my copy. Very fast and very silent AF.
customer_reviews.author: university champ

customer_reviews.title: Nice lens
customer_reviews.text: I've read a number of reviews that were a little critical of this lens but that seems to be fairly common with any kit lens. For my needs, this is a great walking around lens. It focuses quickly and precisely and gives me good photos. On top of that, I bought it used and got a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks like new, the lens is in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Axel Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Useful if you want to actually use your camera. Average-ish in quality, I prefer the other lenses I have but it is a good default lens.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition and have had no issues with it since we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: damien fink

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lens
customer_reviews.text: Picked it up for my VG10. Its a clean picture, and very smooth to operate. its very lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Quitoriano

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The SEL 18-55 E-mount works well, I just wish it was sharper!
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I knew about this lens, for my brand new camera the SONY next7, which is an amazing product, has so many tricks I will be learning how to use them properly for months. the lens just purchased is much lighter for close ups, and gives a good zoom range.
customer_reviews.author: OSLE

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!! Very, very pleased with everything about this. It came a week early and it was packaged nicely. The lens was in very good shape and I'm glad I can add another lens to my Nex Interchangeable Lens collection. I will definitely buy from this company again and recommend to others. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Liuy Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good lens, I bought it used because like most Sony products they are overpriced. I picked up a used NEX3N body used for 60 bucks so for 160 I got a darn good camera for everyday use :-) My high end is a Canon :-) Enough said....
customer_reviews.author: J. Sova

customer_reviews.title: Good condition as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good condition as advertised. Impressed with delivery time. Product wise, very nice lens. A definite must have for beginner photographers especially. The clarify of this lens is much better than the 16-50. Highly recommend this lens.
customer_reviews.author: Aman Verma

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Companion for the NEX Sony Camera. A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: The lens is very light despite the size, very sharp image, focus and zoom handle is very comftable. Images are sharp as any othe rsony lens. The size is appropiate for the camera, I feared that it could be too long for a comfortable handling, but it's just perfectly designed.I recomend to buy a sleeve or a pouch or a case, because it doesn't come with it (I have bought other brand lenses for other cameras and they usually come with it). I'm very happy with my purchase as much i have been with my NEX camera, just love the whole package.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: lens
customer_reviews.text: i love it, and its perfect and it was brand new and i use it and take so much care of it. it was just what i needed
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Machado

customer_reviews.title: prompt shipping and great product!
customer_reviews.text: prompt shipping and great product! Thank you very much! The lens will be used for my daughter in a trip to other continental. She is very happy to have it before she is leaving.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: When the lense arrived at my house it was loose in the box. There was a small Amount of bubble wrap in the box plus some green bubble pack too. I'm assuming the small bubble wrap was meant to be around the lense but it wasn't. It was pathetic packaging. Then when I took the lense out of the box there was a big finger print on the glass of the lense. Man O man what a pitiful way to mail a camera lense.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gail Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lens works great but I can only give it three stars because ...
customer_reviews.text: Lens works great but I can only give it three stars because the lens came with some sort of spot inside the lens that I cannot clean out. It's either a grain of sand or something. I realize that there way have been a risk in purchasing a used lens. Other than that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good lens to get for your NEX if you don't have it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my NEX VG10 even thought I have the 18-200 because it lightened up the camera and allows you to do a dolly zoom or track zoom easier then its bigger brother.
customer_reviews.author: W. Deptuch

customer_reviews.title: Great Lens for an Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Wow. THat's what I have to say about the 18-55 lens and the Sony Nex-5 I've mounted it on. Photo quality, ease or use and sheer fun-ness of use are all A+++. Great features on the Nex-5 like simple panoramic images or automatic photo when a smile is evident are enhanced by the lens quality of the 18-55. Go on, leave your Canon EOS lenses home, pick up the Nex-5 and bring some fun back into your photo adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Abidor

product_meta.title: Sony Alpha SEL1855 E-mount 18-55mm F3.5-5.6 OSS Lens (Silver)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER



E 18-55MM F3.5-5.6 OSS STANDARD ZOOM LENS
This 27mm wide angle to 82.5mm medium telephoto equivalent (35mm full frame format) range in a compact 3x E-mount zoom that is suitable for landscapes, snapshots, portraits, and more. Built-in Optical SteadyShot (OSS) provides approximately a four-stop image stabilization advantage, and an internal drive motor ensures smooth, quiet autofocus and aperture operation.

TECHNOLOGY
CIRCULAR APERTURE
When changing your aperture to defocus the background, the light sources appear blurred. This ‘bokeh’ effect of the blurred background can be enhanced with circular aperture blades used in this lens. Conventional aperture blades have flat sides creating unappealing polygonal shaped defocussed points of light. α lenses overcome this problem through a unique design that keeps the aperture almost perfectly circular from its wide-open setting to when it is closed by 2 stops. Smoother, more natural defocusing can be obtained as a result.

ASPHERICAL LENS ELEMENTS
Aspherical lens design dramatically reduces spherical aberration while also reducing lens size and weight. Spherical aberration is a slight misalignment of the light rays projected on the image plane. This is caused by differences in refraction at different points on conventional spherical lenses which degrade image quality in large-aperture lenses. Specially shaped “aspherical” elements near the diaphragm restore alignment of light rays at the image plane, maintaining high sharpness and contrast even at maximum aperture and can also be used at other points in the optical path to reduce distortion. Well-designed aspherical elements can reduce the total number of elements required in the lens, thus reducing overall size and weight. Advanced Aspherical (AA) elements are an evolved variant, featuring an extremely high thickness ratio between the center and periphery. AA elements are exceedingly difficult to produce, relying on the most advanced molding technology to consistently and precisely achieve the required shape and surface accuracy, resulting in significantly improved image accuracy and quality.

DISTANCE ENCODER
The distance encoder plays an integral part in ADI flash metering, which delivers high precision flash metering that is unaffected by the reflectance of subjects or backgrounds. The distance encoder is a lens component that directly detects the position of the focusing mechanism, and sends a signal to the CPU in order to measure distance to the subject. During flash photography, this data is very useful in calculating how much flash output is appropriate to the scene.

LENS-BASED OPTICAL IMAGE STABILIZATION
Gyro sensors built into the lens detect even the slightest movement, and the stabilization lens is precisely shifted to counteract any image blur that might occur. The use of precision, quiet linear motors and technology inherited from high-end Sony professional camcorders results in exceptionally quiet, effective image stabilization that contributes to high-quality movies as well as stills.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
INTERNAL FOCUSING
Only the middle groups of the optical system move to achieve focus, so the overall length of the lens does not change. Other important benefits include fast autofocusing and a short minimum focusing distance. Also, the filter thread at the front of the lens does not rotate, which is convenient if you’re using a polarizing filter.
